name: Shelly the Jelly
description:
Help Shelly cross the street to get to the Deli! In this 3D endless runner, you have to stretch your size, change color, and switch lanes to match on coming shapes. Complete the levels to learn basic controls, then see how long you can last in the arcade mode!

This is a game made by Evan Brook, Chris Payne, Sean McManus, and Brent Peterson for our Game Studio class.
